Plot: An east European girl goes to America with her young son, expecting it to be like a Hollywood film.
Title: Dancer in the Dark
Actors: Björk, Catherine Deneuve, David Morse, Peter Stormare
tomatoConsensus: Dancer in Dark can be grim, dull, and difficult to watch, but even so, it has a powerful and moving performance from Bjork and is something quite new and visionary.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 33 wins & 45 nominations.
Country: Denmark, Spain, Germany, Netherlands, Italy, USA, UK, France, Sweden, Finland, Iceland, Norway
